GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
media: dvb-core: Fix double free in dvb_register_device()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 7dd5a68cdbbbe7fc67ba701cb52ba10d8ba149f8, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit fcd5ce4b3936242e6679875a4d3c3acfc8743e15. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: media: dvb-core: Fix double free in dvb_register_device()
